name: react-native-router-screen
description: React Native Router Screen is a powerful and flexible navigation library for React Native applications. It provides a comprehensive and customizable navigation solution for building complex navigation structures in your mobile apps. Below is a description of its key features and components: Navigation Stack Management,Customizable Navigation Bars, Drawer Navigation, Tab Navigation, Custom Transitions, Dynamic Routes and Parameters, Router Configuration, Context and State Management, Screen Rendering and Navigation Logic, Customization and Extensibility.
author: SRAKIB17
